name: HENTAI Arcade: Lustful Girls
description:
HENTAI Arcade: Lustful Girls is a collection of various games to raise your mood. And not only. The game contains 45 levels and after completing each level you will unlock one of the best erotic artworks.
All characters depicted in this game are entirely fictitious and over 18 years old.Features
  • 45 Great artworks from the best artists
  • Five different game modes:
  1. Snake - Control your python in the hunt for apples and naked girls

  2. Pong - Fight in a fierce battle with Artificial Intelligence for hot art pieces

  3. Arkanoid - Break rectangular blocks that stand between you and your pleasure

  4. Xonix - Cut through your way to piquant art without letting enemies touch you. Good luck on the last levels :)

  5. Puzzle - The special mode where you can twirl pictures of naked girls as you please. Only here you can touch the girls in different places!

  • Relaxing music that will help you get the most out of the game
  • 54 Аchievements
  • Gallery, where you can find full-size artworks
  • Super Zoom for a detailed study of the content presented in the game
Come play and show these girls who's the boss of this game :)
Controls
  • Main Menu:
G - On/Off Music
K - Volume Down
L - Volume Up

  • In the levels the same controls, but additionally:
L.CTRL - On/Off Cursor
R - Restart Level
ESC - Pause
